name: 5 Vegas - Miami - M5
additionalNotes: irst generation Cuban-seed produces a rustic flavor that's Cuban-esque in nature with a delicious twang sought by many. When grown in Nicaragua, a deep richness is added, creating a luxurious sensation of flavors. 5 Vegas Miami employs a generous dose of these Nicaraguan-grown tobaccos to develop a full-bodied display of earth, leather, toast, oak and hearty spices with enough gusto to satisfy the most discerning of palates.
